meanings.definition: Reacting more strongly or emotionally than is necessary or appropriate.
meanings.sent1: She is always overreacting to small problems.
meanings.sent2: He felt embarrassed after overreacting to the joke.
meanings.sent3: The movie character's overreacting behavior made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her fear of spiders led to overreacting whenever she saw one.
meanings.sent5: The overreacting child cried for hours over a tiny scratch.

meanings.definition: To respond excessively or disproportionately to a situation.
meanings.sent1: Try not to overreacting to criticism.
meanings.sent2: She tends to overreacting when things don't go her way.
meanings.sent3: The chef started overreacting when he burnt the toast.
meanings.sent4: His overreacting to the news made everyone worried.
meanings.sent5: Overreacting to a minor mistake can cause unnecessary stress.
